[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-faucet/core/src/checkers/memory_ratelimit.rs] [Function: check()] [Boundary value testing] What happens when max_requests_per_day is set to 1 - does the checker allow exactly 1 request per day as expected, or are there off-by-one errors? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-faucet/core/src/checkers/memory_ratelimit.rs] [Function: complete()] [Silent failure] Does complete() at line 93 silently succeed with Ok(()) even if the decrement fails, potentially breaking rate limit guarantees? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-faucet/core/src/checkers/memory_ratelimit.rs] [Function: check()] [Lock holding duration] Does holding the lock from line 75 to line 90 block other requests for too long during high load, causing timeouts or degraded performance? (Low)
